basic_data.name: DMU 75 monoBLOCK
basic_data.additional_name: Material for machining: Steel, Stainless steel, Aluminum, Cast iron, Non-ferrous metals, Plastic
basic_data.description: The DMU 75 monoBLOCK is a high-performance machining center primarily used in the metal industry. It enables both milling and turning operations. Thanks to its compact design and advanced automation functions, the DMU 75 monoBLOCK is a popular choice in the engineering sector.

main_characteristics.title: Ergonomic design for optimal performance
content: With a wide door clearance and compact design, it occupies only 8 m² of space, allowing easy access to the working area. Additionally, the unrestricted crane loading capacity of up to 600 kg and quick access through 3-point support make this machine an ideal solution for demanding production tasks.

main_characteristics.title: Precision solutions for perfect details
content: It stands out with excellent precision thanks to comprehensive cooling, high-performance coolant, and standard multi-sensor compensation. Ensuring a positioning accuracy of 4 µm as standard, it enables the production of the highest quality workpieces. Additionally, direct-drive ball screws in the X and Y axes ensure reliability and efficiency in machining processes.

main_characteristics.title: Reliability and stability in one
content: Thanks to the rigid monoBLOCK construction, the DMU 75 provides maximum stability achieved through a single casting. The one-piece column, equipped with large, stable sliding and roller guides with a diameter of 45 mm on all axes, ensures reliability during machining. Additionally, large ball screws in all axes with ø 40 / 50 / 40 mm, supported by FEM optimization of all components, guarantee maximum stability. The rotary table clamps complete the construction, ensuring solid and precise workpiece holding during operation.
